author: timbeiko
content:
Based on the CL call discussion right now, the only practical difference at this point is whether we keep the Sep 29th ACD call or not. We can decide that on the next ACD! 

In the meantime, I'll put together a proposal for how we can approach the review of the various Shanghai EIPs in a more async way during the 3-4 weeks off, so we can discuss it next week on the call - assuming we're not merging right when it happens ðŸ˜… !
